events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit properly. Please advise how I can proceed.
The customer's case was categorized under 'Refund' since they requested a refund due to sizing issues with their recent purchase.
The support agent specializing in refund cases has been assigned to handle the customer's request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you wish to return the jacket and get a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process your refund faster.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and has not been worn or washed in any way.

Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label, which I will email to you shortly. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the shipping label.
The prepaid shipping label was sent to the customer's email. Customer was given instructions to return the item and informed about the refund timeline.
We wanted to check in to confirm that you were able to send back the jacket and if you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund process was completed successfully and the customer responded positively, the case has been closed. Thank you for contacting support!
